long_description: Keep your gear locked to your car rack with this pair of 13 ft. long Thule Locking Straps. Two 13-foot straps are theft-resistant using nylon constructed sleeves with internal steel cables. Aluminum buckles are lightweight and corrosion resistant. 2 One-Key(TM) lock cylinders and keys included; rubber-coated lock housings prevent scratches to car and gear.
short_description: Keep your gear locked to your car rack with this pair of 13 ft. long Thule Locking Straps.
